response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. After careful consideration and evaluation, I am pleased to offer you this exceptional item at a special price of $950,000. This represents a significant saving compared to its true worth of $1,200,000 to you, making it a compelling investment. I believe this price reflects the quality and value of the product while allowing us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you have any questions about the product.", "product_price": 950000}
